name: Escape from Soul Manor Prison Complex
name_original: Escape from Soul Manor Prison Complex
description: Escape Soul Manor Prison Complex in this puzzle adventure game! You play as Burt, a wrongfully accused thief trapped in a otherworldly prison. Find your way out and clear your name! A game made in 24 hours for the Noodle in the grass game jam,                                                               December 29, 2018.
